text:
I may get downvoted for this but oh well. 

I’m a dog walker in NYC. I love my job and I’ve been doing this for 5+ years. 

However with the COVID-19 issues going around, a very large portion of my income is gone. I have 60% of my clients working from home and their dogs don’t need me. 

While I understand the social distancing, try to utilize your dog walkers at least once a week or something if you income isn’t impacted, some of us need the money and don’t have a large enough savings built up. 

I’m grateful I do have savings but a lot of independents and freelancers are struggling. 

Thanks for listening to my feelings.
title: Please if you can, try to support your dog walkers during this time.
